text: Yadi chitai nai kehi dhana–sampatti prapta hune bha'e ra yatra pani sajilo bha'eko bha'e, uniharu avasya nai tapa'imko pachi hind'ihalthe, kintu margako duri uniharula'i kathina ra lamo lagyo. Aba uniharu allahaka sapatha khanechan ki, ‘‘yadi hamima yasako samathrya bha'eko bha'e avasya nai tapa'imko sathama niskanthyauaim’’. Uniharule svayam aphula'i vinasama parirakheka chan ra allaha ramrari jandacha ki niscaya nai uniharu jhutha hun
